title: Do questions repeat in the biology CBSE 12th boards? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: There are several question do get repeated in all board exams. Since most of all questions are only reapeated. Only few comes to syllabus based text book. In biology…. About Cell formation , blood vessels, Difussion, osmosis, solution of around leaves changing colours ,about flower, fruits structure about brain structure, eyes and sense organ, about heart, general digestive system, male and female reproductive system, about hormones , about nervous system , about vitamin and their deficiency, about diseases with symptoms and their vaccince and control of population …… Form these all the board have reapeated many times. For past thirty years. Only new and unexpected onces that could least , yet based on germation of seed to shoot, the neuron structure, about nutrition, about trees and names and all the factors.. … Advice : its better if you are through with previous papers since 2000s and answer them with your way and revise your notes.
